canon Class Reference

Class canon was created so canonLine and machineStatus could easily share some things. The only shared items are the unimplemented function abc2dir, and the types degrees and toolNumber. At this time, the list of tools will be handled within the machineStatus class. More...

static const gp_Dir abc2dir (double a, double b, double c)

Detailed Description

Class canon was created so canonLine and machineStatus could easily share some things. The only shared items are the unimplemented function abc2dir, and the types degrees and toolNumber. At this time, the list of tools will be handled within the machineStatus class.
